General.Name: Discovery Silver Corp.
General.Description: Discovery Silver Corp., a mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration and development of polymetallic mineral deposits. The company's flagship property is the Cordero silver project, comprising 26 contiguous claims that covers an area of 34,909 contiguous hectares located in the Chihuahua state, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Discovery Metals Corp. and changed its name to Discovery Silver Corp. Discovery Silver Corp. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
